Miscellaneous Notes

Applicability of § 101(r) of D.C. Law 12-124: Section 401(c) of D.C. Law 12- 124, as amended by § 60 of D.C. Law 12-264, provided that § 101(h), (l), (m), (n), (o)(2) through (5), (q), (r), (t), (u), (w), and (y) of the act shall apply as of October 21, 1998.
